nobaaddons.name: NobaAddons
config.chat.filter.tipMessage.tooltip: Toggles the messages sent when you tip a player or are tipped by someone else
Allow obtain messages to get sent if you have the Pickup/Obtain messages turned off
config.chatCommands.dm.enabled.tooltip:
Enable chat commands when people §b/msg§r you
§3/noba help dmCommands§r
config.chatCommands.dm.partyMe.tooltip:
Invites the messaging user to a party 
§7Aliases: 'pme'
config.chatCommands.dm.warpMe.tooltip: Warps the messaging user to your lobby
config.chatCommands.party.enabled.toolti:
Enable chat commands in party chat
§3/noba help partyCommands§r
config.chatCommands.party.transfer.toolt:
Transfer the party to the player who ran the command or the optional username
§7Aliases: 'pt [username]', 'ptme'§r
config.chatCommands.party.warp.tooltip: Runs §b/p warp§r when used, with an optional delay
config.chatCommands.party.coords.tooltip: Sends your current coordinates in party chat when used
config.chatCommands.guild.enabled.toolti:
Enable chat commands in guild chat
§3/noba help guildCommands§r
